snippet.title: Five Night at Freddy's 3 - Subtitles Update on Mobile
snippet.description:
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/five-nights-at-freddys-3/id973482987

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.scottgames.fnaf3&hl=en_US&gl=US

Follow our channel for more Five Nights at Freddy's news!

We have finished refurbishing "Fazbear's Fright: The Horror Attraction" with a fresh coat of paint. We now provided a customer experience in 11 different languages! Now even more people can experience the revival of the legend as we make the experience as authentic got even more patrons.

Five Nights at Freddy's 3 is now updated to include subtitles for English, French, German, Dutch, Spanish (Latin America), Italian, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified), Korean. We also have added some additional features and polish see below for changelog. 

It's available now, If you speak one of these non-English languages please tell your friends to visit your favorite pizzeria! PLEASE NOTE: Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for death or dismemberment.

- Options screen
- Subtitles in 11 languages (see app description)
- Improved virtual controller
- Improved usability of interactive elements
- Increased panning speed (office)
- Revamped vibrations
- Various fixes and improvements

#MadeWithFusion #FNaF
